participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and disciplined, with a passion for education and wellness.
participant_1.background: I am a teacher. I drink coffee every day. I have a twin sister. I love chocolate. I do yoga every morning.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Introverted and contemplative, with a love for music and solitude.
participant_2.background: I like reading. I enjoy taking late night walks when it's completely dark. I like being by myself. My favorite band is Dream Theater. Pizza is my most favorite thing.
